questions.question: What is the best way for a new restaurant to build an online presence?
options: A) Create a social media page and list the restaurant on Google My Business
B) Rely only on word-of-mouth marketing
C) Avoid online marketing because food businesses don’t need it

questions.question: What should a skincare brand add to its website to build trust?
options: A) Customer testimonials, product reviews, and FAQs
B) Fancy graphics with no product details
C) Hidden pricing so people must DM to ask

questions.question: What kind of content should a hair vendor post on Instagram to increase sales?
options: A) Before-and-after videos, customer testimonials, and styling tutorials
B) Only still images of hair products
C) Random pictures with no branding

questions.question: How can a cake business with no official branding look more professional?
options: A) Design a clear logo, pick brand colors, and use them consistently online
B) Sell cakes without a brand name
C) Use different colors for each post

questions.question: What should a phone accessories business avoid to appear more trustworthy online?
options: A) Blurry product photos and an unclear brand identity
B) Consistent branding with clear images
C) Positive customer reviews

questions.question: How can an online boutique make its Instagram page look appealing?
options: A) Post consistently with well-lit photos and clear product descriptions
B) Change logo every few months for variety
C) Only post items without branding details

questions.question: What offline strategy can help a handmade bag business reach more local customers?
options: A) Print flyers, attend local fairs, and use branded packaging
B) Ignore local customers and focus only on social media
C) Change business name every month

questions.question: What’s the best offline branding strategy to sell more wedding cakes?
options: A) Partner with wedding planners and use branded cake boxes
B) Only sell cakes at the bakery without any promotion
C) Avoid branding because cakes sell themselves

questions.question: How can a salon attract more walk-in customers?
options: A) Display a bold signboard, distribute flyers, and have a well-branded interior
B) Keep the shop plain with no signage
C) Change shop name frequently

questions.question: What is the best content strategy for a jewelry business on Instagram?
options: A) Show styling videos, customer testimonials, and behind-the-scenes clips
B) Only post pictures of the jewelry
C) Avoid using captions
